name: Iburu Magical Demo
description:
Basically this story takes a walking noir-detective trope protagonist and puts him into the dark fantasy genre. He also becomes a magical girl - it's a wild ride!

Children are going missing, the ghouls are taking over, and the world is running out of magic. Join our (reluctantly) cross-dressing magical girl protagonist as he finds the courage to stand up against the ghouls and unveils the disturbing truth behind these disappearances.

This is just a demo of the first chapter, I'm still working on the full game. All aspects of this project will be improved upon and updated in the full release.

If you like the demo and you'd like to see the full version, then please follow me here on Itch.io to get it for free - offer only available for a limited time upon release.

Content considerations - Please note that this demo contains the following themes:

- Smoking

- Cross-dressing

- Noir/mystery elements/atmosphere

- Criminal organizations

- Violence

Thank you very much for playing. All comments are welcome and encouraged, I'd love to hear your thoughts.
